Class InstructionFactory<Instr extends Instruction>

java.lang.Object
InstructionFactory<Instr>
Type Parameters:
Instr - concrete class defining instruction
All Implemented Interfaces:
InstructionFactoryInterface
public class InstructionFactory<Instr extends Instruction>
extends java.lang.Object
implements InstructionFactoryInterface
generic class defining factory of instruction

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    InstructionFactory​(java.lang.Class<? extends Instr> impl)
    create factory from class object of instruction class

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static java.util.ArrayList<InstructionFactoryInterface> factoriesByIndex()
    get factories by index (useful when disassembling)
    static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​InstructionFactoryInterface> factoriesByMnemonic()
    get factories by mnemonic (useful when assembling)

    create instruction given parsed assembly
    java.util.Optional<Instruction> fromOpcode​(short opcode)
    create instruction given opcode from bytecode
    java.lang.String getMnemonic()
    used to get mnemonic of this factory
    short getOpcode()
    get opcode of current factory
    int getOpcodeMaskAccuracy()
    used to get number of bits in opcode mask which are set to determine the correct order in which opcode is checked against instructions (before you try with mask 0xf000 you should try with 0xff00 because 0xf000 will match when 0xf000 matches so 0xff00 should be checked first

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • InstructionFactory

      public InstructionFactory​(java.lang.Class<? extends Instr> impl) throws java.lang.NoSuchMethodException, java.lang.IllegalAccessException, java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException
      create factory from class object of instruction class
      Parameters:
      impl - class object of instruction class
      Throws:
      java.lang.NoSuchMethodException - thrown when instruction class does not implement getOpcodeMask, getMask, getMnemonic static functions
      java.lang.IllegalAccessException - thrown when instruction class does not implement getOpcodeMask, getMask, getMnemonic static functions
      java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException - thrown when instruction class does not implement getOpcodeMask, getMask, getMnemonic static functions

    • getOpcodeMaskAccuracy

      public int getOpcodeMaskAccuracy()
      used to get number of bits in opcode mask which are set to determine the correct order in which opcode is checked against instructions (before you try with mask 0xf000 you should try with 0xff00 because 0xf000 will match when 0xf000 matches so 0xff00 should be checked first
      Specified by:
      getOpcodeMaskAccuracy in interface InstructionFactoryInterface
      Returns:
      number of bits set

    • factoriesByIndex

      public static java.util.ArrayList<InstructionFactoryInterface> factoriesByIndex() throws java.lang.Exception
      get factories by index (useful when disassembling)
      Returns:
      factories as array
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception - may be thrown when setting up factories

    • factoriesByMnemonic

      public static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​InstructionFactoryInterface> factoriesByMnemonic() throws java.lang.Exception
      get factories by mnemonic (useful when assembling)
      Returns:
      hashmap of factories (mnemonic -> factory)
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception - may be thrown when setting up factories
